content.raw:
Yes @rmerriam you are right. I have tested the exact same software (I carry it around the whole OS on a disk and use it on different computers) and it works. Most likely the computer I tested doesn't have the correct nvidia drivers. 

I also tried removing the GPU_ and it works as well.

I would like this issue to remain open until we get an official answer. I don't feel confident about submitting qual1 logs after changing the valkyrie description files. Maybe the default behaviour should be to use the RAY instead of GPU_RAY.

Paging @nkoenig since he was looking for a solution of #15.
